name: Fuller House
overview: D.J. Tanner-Fuller is a widow and mother of three. Things become too much to handle, so she asks for help from her sister Stephanie and her best-friend Kimmy.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: With teen romance, family barbecues, a wedding abroad and (just maybe?) a brand-new baby, it's shaping up to be the fullest summer yet.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The Tanner-Fuller-Gibblers are back with big laughs. DJ and Steve rekindle their flame -- and a new member of the family is on the way!

episodes.name: Our Very First Show, Again
episodes.overview: The entire Tanner clan comes together for a final reunion before the family home is sold, but parting turns out to be tougher than expected

episodes.name: Moving Day
episodes.overview: When the big day comes for Stephanie and Kimmy to join the Fuller house, Jackson feels outnumbered and takes drastic action

episodes.name: Funner House
episodes.overview: When Stephanie, Kimmy and DJ have a girls' night out and leave Joey in charge of the kids, things get wild out on the town and at home.

episodes.name: The Not-So-Great Escape
episodes.overview: Jackson tries to help Ramona at school but that lands them both in trouble and leads to a disagreement between DJ and Kimmy over parenting styles.

episodes.name: Mad Max
episodes.overview: When an old friend whisks her away for a concert and after-hours fun, Stephanie realizes how much her nephews mean to her. Kimmy finds DJ a date.

episodes.name: The Legend of El Explosivo
episodes.overview: DJ punishes Jackson, causing him to muss his favorite Mexican wrestling league, Lucha Kaboom. But only leads to more action for the fans.

episodes.name: Ramona's Not-So-Epic Party
episodes.overview: Steve tries setting up DJ's handsome coworker with Kimmy, and Ramona's much-anticipated 13th birthday party doesn't turn out as planned for anybody.

episodes.name: Secrets, Lies and Firetrucks
episodes.overview: When Max learns to lie, he also learns that lies can backfire. Meanwhile, the ladies of the house fall in love with secrets.

episodes.name: War of the Roses
episodes.overview: After 1,000 roses show up without a card, DJ, Kimmy and Stephanie must figure out which one of them has a secret admirer.

episodes.name: A Giant Leap
episodes.overview: Things get out of hand when Stephanie's new boyfriend, Hunter Pence of the San Fransisco Giants, invites everybody to one of his baseball games.

episodes.name: Partnerships in the Night
episodes.overview: Stephanie and Kimmy form a strange partnership. DJ's boss retires, and Max has Jackson and Ramona right where he wants them.

episodes.name: Save the Dates
episodes.overview: DJ has a date with her past that catches get off guard, and Kimmy's date with Fernando is nothing but surprises.

episodes.name: Love is in the Air
episodes.overview: When Jesse and Becky return to renew their vows, a bachelorette party leads to trouble for DJ, who is forced to make a decision.

episodes.name: Welcome Back
episodes.overview: DJ finally decides between Matt and Steve, but they throw her a curveball before her annual back-to-school barbecue. A homeless Fernando moves in.

episodes.name: Mom Interference
episodes.overview: It's a full house for game night when Steve and Matt bring uninvited guests. Jackson decides to join the football team.

episodes.name: Ramona's Not-So-Epic First Kiss
episodes.overview: Ramona's first kiss leads to a heartbreaking lesson in love. A memorable "Sister Night" makes wedding crashers out of DJ and Stephanie.

episodes.name: Curse of Tanner Manor
episodes.overview: Jackson and Ramona would rather die than go to DJ's "scary" family Halloween party, where Fernando and Kimmy pull off the ultimate couples costume.

episodes.name: Doggy Daddy
episodes.overview: A not-so-typical day involves a dance audition, a toddler play date, four chickens and a vet emergency. Matt comes to an important realization.

episodes.name: Fuller Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: The house feels overstuffed when the entire Tanner family shows up for Thanksgiving, pushing DJ's organizational skills into overdrive.

episodes.name: Girl Talk
episodes.overview: Kimmy hatches a plan to get the girls' childhood band, Girl Talk, back together. A vengeful video making fun of Ramona goes viral.

episodes.name: A Tangled Web
episodes.overview: While Jackson pet-sits for Lola, DJ works overtime to help Max ace a school project. Jimmy makes a music video for Stephanie's latest song.

episodes.name: Glazed & Confused
episodes.overview: With out-of-town trips planned for the adults, Uncle Joey delivers doughnuts -- and unexpected drama. Stephanie's nervous about singing on television.

episodes.name: New Kids in the House
episodes.overview: Kimmy and Stephanie have an epic surprise planned for DJ's 39th birthday, but Max cooks up a painful twist that changes everything.

episodes.name: DJ and Kimmy's High School Reunion
episodes.overview: A high school reunion leaves DJ wondering whether she still has feelings for Steve, while a hapless Kimmy is trending for all the wrong reasons.

episodes.name: Nutcrackers
episodes.overview: 'Tis the season to be in love, but Stephanie doesn't want to hear it. Max gets a girlfriend for Christmas, and Ramona suits up for "The Nutcracker."

episodes.name: Happy New Year Baby
episodes.overview: Steve comes to DJ for help with an important proposal. Jesse and Becky's new addition brings Danny and Joey home -- and has Jimmy spouting baby talk.

episodes.name: Best Summer Ever
episodes.overview: Steve and CJ announce plans for a destination wedding, and DJ sends Jackson to summer school. Stephanie and Jimmy suspect Fernando is up to something.

episodes.name: Break A Leg
episodes.overview: Wedding planner Kimmy works overtime to earn Steve and CJ’s business, and DJ signs on as Stephanie’s life coach. Jimmy and Fernando move in together.

episodes.name: Declarations Of Independence
episodes.overview: The Danny Tanner Annual Fourth of July Barbecue brings everyone home for some star-spangled fun. But heartbreak might be on the menu.

episodes.name: My Little Hickey
episodes.overview: While Steve samples wedding cakes, Ramona goes to great lengths to hide a hickey from her mother. Jackson's study group takes over the house.

episodes.name: Uncle Jesse's Adventures In Babysitting
episodes.overview: While the ladies are out for the night, Uncle Jesse is left in charge, putting out fires left and right. Fernando restores Kimmy's childhood home.

episodes.name: M-M-M-My Ramona
episodes.overview: DJ's thrilled when Jackson agrees to shadow her at the office. Fernando builds Ramona a lavish bedroom -- complete with a frozen yogurt bar.

episodes.name: Say Yes To The Dress
episodes.overview: A bridal shop mishap leaves DJ doubting the future of her friendship with Steve. Gia's daughter comes over to study and winds up spending the night.

episodes.name: Maybe Baby
episodes.overview: Becky takes Stephanie to the doctor to find out whether she's got a shot at motherhood. Kimmy helps Joey show his kids who's boss.

episodes.name: Wedding Or Not Here We Come
episodes.overview: The gang is flying coach for Steve and CJ's wedding -- but Max and Fernando plan to sit in first class. Stephanie starts her search for sperm donors.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Japanese Wedding
episodes.overview: In Japan, Steve and CJ's wedding dishes up one disaster after another -- from a maid of honor who's MIA to a talking toilet with an alarming appetite.

episodes.name: Troller Coaster
episodes.overview: A letter prompts Ramona to reconsider her future, and Max tempts fate on the "Troller Coaster." Steve and DJ have an important talk.

episodes.name: Fast Times at Bayview High
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Steph visit the fertility clinic, and Jackson and Ramona start high school. A big surprise at work brings Matt and DJ closer together.

episodes.name: A Tommy Tale
episodes.overview: DJ pulls out all the stops to get Tommy into a prestigious preschool. Jackson and Ramona unplug for "Pioneer Day" -- so Kimmy decides to join them.

episodes.name: Surrogate City
episodes.overview: Steph and Jimmy launch their search for a surrogate mother. A rebellious Jackson's "cool" new look pushes all of DJ's buttons.

episodes.name: Soul Sisters
episodes.overview: Kimmy snags Steph for some "soul sister" bonding while DJ attempts a day off. Max breaks a Tanner family heirloom and tries to hide the evidence.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After
episodes.overview: The She-Wolves suit up to help when Ramona's "Best Homecoming Dance Ever" ... isn't. Kimmy and Steph cater to a demanding client.

episodes.name: Fullers in a Fog
episodes.overview: Bad karma clouds the house when Danny, Jesse and Joey come home to celebrate their 30-year “Dad-iversary" while DJ preps for an important date.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Sun
episodes.overview: With big things hanging in the balance, the gang tries to revive the Tanner-Fuller magic with an '80s -- themed bash -- complete with costumes.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: With teen romance, family barbecues, a wedding abroad and (just maybe?) a brand-new baby, it's shaping up to be the fullest summer yet.

episodes.name: Oh My Santa
episodes.overview: When Max gets a case of the bah-humbugs -- and Tommy has a meltdown at the mall -- DJ does everything she can to get them back in the Christmas spirit.

episodes.name: Big Night
episodes.overview: The pressure's on for Steve and DJ to have a perfect date. Meanwhile, back at the house, Steph forbids Kimmy and Fernando from canoodling.

episodes.name: A Sense of Purpose
episodes.overview: With a baby on the way, Steph starts thinking like a provider. Danny ponders going back to work, and Matt and DJ try to bust each other's businesses.

episodes.name: Ghosted
episodes.overview: Steve and DJ's "two-week-iversary" turns into a gift-giving competition. Steph performs at her first kids' party, and Ramona gets ghosted.

episodes.name: No Escape
episodes.overview: DJ and Steve go on a double date with Matt and his new girlfriend. Steph and Kimmy host a Lamaze class at the house -- with hilarious results.

episodes.name: Angels' Night Out
episodes.overview: While Joey watches the boys at home, DJ and the girls don flashy costumes for a '70s-themed cruise. But it's not quite the crowd they expected.

episodes.name: President Fuller
episodes.overview: Max runs for fourth-grade class president -- but his girlfriend Rose is running, too. DJ tries to make up with CJ, and Steph picks a fight with a clown.

episodes.name: Driving Mr. Jackson
episodes.overview: Jackson and Ramona's first high school party has major consequences. Becky and Jesse team up to host an awards show, where a big win goes to Matt's head.

episodes.name: Perfect Sons
episodes.overview: Fernando's mother pays a surprise visit, and Steve teaches Jackson how to drive. Max makes a memorable debut on "Wake Up San Francisco."

episodes.name: Golden-Toe Fuller
episodes.overview: Jackson's a star football player -- but the pressure is getting to him. DJ plans a gender reveal party, and Jesse tries to bond with other dads.

episodes.name: It's Always Open
episodes.overview: When DJ worries that Jimmy isn't ready for fatherhood, an angry Steph responds by joining a dodgeball team. Kimmy sets Ramona up with her new intern.

episodes.name: The Prom
episodes.overview: Prom night brings big problems for Jackson and Ramona. Meanwhile, a power-hungry DJ is taking her role as head chaperone a little too seriously.

episodes.name: Opening Night
episodes.overview: A ladies' night out to see "Hamilton" with a fully pregnant Kimmy ends differently than anyone expected. Whoa, baby!

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The Tanner-Fuller-Gibblers are back with big laughs. DJ and Steve rekindle their flame -- and a new member of the family is on the way!

episodes.name: Welcome Home, Baby-to-Be-Named-Later
episodes.overview: Steph and Jimmy come home with their baby -- but they still haven't named her. With a doula in the house, DJ and Danny don't feel like they're needed.

episodes.name: Hale's Kitchen
episodes.overview: A burrito delivery brings love at first sight for Ramona, and Steve surprises DJ with a cooking class. Busy mom Steph struggles to keep her promises.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: Steve takes Jimmy and Fernando to lunch -- and they end up buying a sandwich shop. Ramona and Jackson help Max face his fears at the pool.

episodes.name: Moms' Night Out
episodes.overview: Gia joins the She-Wolf Pack for a night of dancing, complete with stars, while Matt has a "Dudes Night In." Later, Matt tries to bond with Rocki.

episodes.name: Ready Player Fuller
episodes.overview: DJ takes up gaming to get closer to Jackson. Business is booming at Jimmy and Fernando's new sandwich shop -- but they're running out of ingredients.

episodes.name: The Mayor's Bird
episodes.overview: Matt and DJ open a pet concierge service, and Steph contemplates her next career move. Ramona's new boyfriend gets roped into Gibbler Game Night.

episodes.name: DJ's Amazing 40th Birthday Race
episodes.overview: It's girls vs. guys when Steve plans an elaborate game for DJ's birthday, and Kimmy and Steph are convinced there's a diamond ring waiting at the end.

episodes.name: Five Dates with Kimmy Gibbler
episodes.overview: Kimmy decides to date around to make sure Fernando's "the one." DJ snags Steph an important audition, and Max and Steve team up to play detective.

episodes.name: A Modest Proposal
episodes.overview: A dutiful DJ springs into action when Fernando asks for help proposing to Kimmy -- again. But the results are even bigger and better than she expected.

episodes.name: Be Yourself, Free Yourself
episodes.overview: Kimmy causes trouble for DJ and Matt when she fills in for their ill receptionist at the vet clinic.
